results.description: Leeds United goalkeeper Kiko Casilla is granted extra time to respond to allegations that he racially abused Charlton Athletic's Jonathan Leko.
results.shortTitle: Casilla gets more time for racism charge
results.title: Kiko Casilla: Leeds United goalkeeper given extra time to respond to racism allegations

results.description: England-based Macauley Bonne withdraws from the Zimbabwe squad days after getting his passport allowing him to play in Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.
results.shortTitle: Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad
results.title: Macauley Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad on 'medical grounds'

results.description: Matt Smith's late header sees Millwall beat south London rivals Charlton Athletic at The Den.
results.shortTitle: Smith scores late winner for Millwall
results.title: Millwall 2-1 Charlton: Matt Smith's late header seals win for Lions

results.description: Bristol City and Charlton are given FA fines after admitting a charge of failing to control their players in their game last month.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City & Charlton fined for fracas
results.title: Bristol City and Charlton Athletic: FA fines clubs after Ashton Gate melee

results.description: Leeds United goalkeeper Kiko Casilla "strenuously denies" a Football Association charge of racial abuse.
results.shortTitle: Leeds' Casilla denies racial abuse charge
results.title: Kiko Casilla: Leeds United goalkeeper denies racial abuse charge

results.description: In-demand Alex Neil's Preston go top of the Championship thanks to Paul Gallagher's second-half penalty against Charlton Athletic at The Valley.
results.shortTitle: Gallagher pen sends Neil's Preston top
results.title: Charlton 0-1 Preston: Paul Gallagher penalty sends Alex Neil's North End top

thumbnail.altText: Alex Neil's Preston top the Championship from Leeds United as a result of having a one-goal better goal difference

results.description: Bristol City and Charlton Athletic are charged by the FA after an incident in their game at Ashton Gate.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City and Charlton face FA charge
results.title: Bristol City and Charlton Athletic: FA charges clubs after Ashton Gate melee

results.description: Charlton Athletic score a stoppage-time penalty to deny 10-man Championship leaders West Bromwich Albion victory.
results.title: West Bromwich Albion 2-2 Charlton Athletic: Baggies held with 10 men

thumbnail.altText: Darnell Furlong in action for West Brom

results.description: Charlton and Wales midfielder Jonny Williams will be out for at least two months after having surgery on a knee injury.
results.title: Jonny Williams: Charlton and Wales midfielder has knee operation

altText: Jonny Williams in action for Charlton

results.description: Josh Brownhill scores a 98th-minute winner as 10-man Bristol City come from behind to beat Charlton and go fourth in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City nab late win over Charlton
results.title: Bristol City 2-1 Charlton Athletic: Josh Brownhill scores 98th-minute winner for Robins

results.description: Conor Gallagher's superb long-range strike caps off a complete performance for Charlton Athletic as they thump Derby County.
results.shortTitle: Charlton cruise to victory over Derby
results.title: Charlton Athletic 3-0 Derby County: Gallagher strike seals superb Addicks win

thumbnail.altText: Charlton players celebrate after scoring at The Valley

results.description: Charlton boss Lee Bowyer gets a three-match touchline ban by the Football Association after admitting a charge of improper conduct.
results.shortTitle: Charlton boss Bowyer given touchline ban
results.title: Lee Bowyer: Charlton boss given three-match touchline ban for improper conduct

results.description: The FA charge Charlton boss Lee Bowyer over comments he is alleged to have made during his side's loss to Swansea.
results.shortTitle: Bowyer to face FA misconduct charges
results.title: Lee Bowyer: FA charge Charlton boss over alleged comments to referee

results.description: Fulham twice come from behind to draw a pulsating London derby against Charlton Athletic at Craven Cottage.
results.shortTitle: Fulham twice come back to deny Charlton
results.title: Fulham 2-2 Charlton Athletic: Aleksandar Mitrovic scores again in Cottagers draw

results.description: Andre Ayew caps a fine Swansea fight-back at Charlton as the visitors reclaim top spot in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Ayew strike sends Swansea back to top
results.title: Charlton Athletic 1-2 Swansea City: Andre Ayew strike sends Swans back to top

thumbnail.altText: Andre Ayew of Swansea City celebrates after scoring

results.description: Relive the action from the EFL as West Brom go top of the Championship and Stoke and AFC Wimbledon earn their first wins of the season.
results.title: Saturday's EFL action as it happened

results.description: The Football Association is investigating an allegation of racial discrimination during the league game between Charlton and Leeds.
results.title: Charlton v Leeds: Football Association investigates claim of racial discrimination

results.description: Manager Steve Cooper believes Swansea City's mind-set will be key against Lee Bowyer's Charlton Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Swans mentality key at Charlton - Cooper
results.title: Swansea City mentality key to success at Charlton, says boss Steve Cooper

results.description: Leeds miss the chance to go top as Macauley Bonne's scrappy goal sees them fall to a first away defeat of the season at Charlton.
results.shortTitle: Leeds suffer first away loss at Charlton
results.title: Charlton Athletic 1-0 Leeds United: Macauley Bonne goal sees Addicks win

results.description: Wigan Athletic centre-back Chey Dunkley scores twice as the Latics defeat Charlton in the Championship at the DW Stadium.
results.shortTitle: Defender Dunkley scores twice in Wigan win
results.title: Wigan Athletic 2-0 Charlton Athletic: Chey Dunkley scores twice in Latics win
